title: 85/168/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 February 1985 authorizing the United Kingdom to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of tableware and other articles of a kind commonly used for domestic or toilet purposes, of porcelain or china, of stoneware, of earthenware or fine pottery originating in the People's Republic of China, which have been put into free circulation in the Community (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 February 1985
authorizing the United Kingdom to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of tableware and other articles of a kind commonly used for domestic or toilet purposes, of porcelain or china, of stoneware, of earthenware or fine pottery originating in the People's Republic of China, which have been put into free circulation in the Community
(Only the English text is authentic)
(85/168/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The United Kingdom is authorized to introduce, until 30 June 1985 and in accordance with Decision 80/47/EEC, intra-Community surveillance of the products set out in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 February 1985.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 16, 22. 1. 1980, p. 14.
(2) OJ No L 175, 30. 6. 1983, p. 1.
ANNEX
